title: Comment on Watch These Women Change How You See Yourself In The Mirror Forever by Inspiring Body Image Videos That Will Touch Your Heart and Help You Realize You’re Enough, Inside and Out! | Like Your Body!
text:
Submit Cancel 
The mirror can be a common enemy among males and females alike. We’re all our own worst critic, sometimes finding it impossibly hard to give ourselves a break for all our self-inflicted scrutiny. That’s why the all-female band, The Mrs., put together this stunt – to remind each and every one of us that we are enough, even on our worst days.
